member.name: T:Narumikazuchi.Math.Numerics.PrimeInteger
member.summary: Represents a prime number.

member.summary: Implicit conversion to struct.

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.Math.Numerics.PrimeInteger.op_Implicit(System.UInt32)~Narumikazuchi.Math.Numerics.PrimeInteger
member.summary: Implicit conversion from struct.

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.Math.Numerics.PrimeInteger.#ctor(System.UInt32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.
member.param: Whether or not to check if the is actually a prime.
member.remarks: Setting to will effectively skip the prime check. This can obviously lead to functional problems later on if handled incorrectly. It is generally a good idea to just leave it at .

member.name: P:Narumikazuchi.Math.Numerics.PrimeInteger.Value
member.summary: Gets the actual value of the struct.

member.name: T:Narumikazuchi.Math.PrimeEnumerator
member.summary: Enumerates through a list of prime numbers.

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.Math.PrimeEnumerator.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets the for this .
member.returns: Itself, if the enumeration has not yet started; else a clone of itself.

member.name: T:Narumikazuchi.Math.PrimeGenerator
member.summary: A helper class that generates prime numbers and checks if a given number is a prime number.

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.Math.PrimeGenerator.IsPrime(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Checks whether the given is a prime number.
member.returns: if the is a prime number; otherwise,

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.Math.PrimeGenerator.NearestSmallerPrime(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the closest prime number to which is also smaller than .
member.param: The relative origin for the search.
member.returns: The closest prime number to which is also smaller than .

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.Math.PrimeGenerator.NearestBiggerPrime(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the closest prime number to which is also bigger than .
member.param: The relative origin for the search.
member.returns: The closest prime number to which is also smaller than .

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.Math.PrimeGenerator.ListUntil(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Enumerates all primes in the range specified by the starting point to the end point.
member.returns: An ascending list of primes that appear in the specified range
